logs_db_host.title: Diagnostics: DB Hostname
logs_db_host.details: The hostname of the instance of \compose\ hosting the database

logs_db_name.title: Diagnostics: DB Name
logs_db_name.details: The name of the database containing the diagnostics logs

db_app_id.title: Diagnostics: App ID
db_app_id.details: The 'App ID' of the app used to access the logs database

db_app_secret.title: Diagnostics: App Secret
db_app_secret.details: The 'App Secret Key' of the app used to access the logs database
